Title: The Silverlight Hyper Video Player  & WP7 Application
Description:
The SLHVP is an extensible hyperVideo platform to orchestrate  media, data, user-experiences, and social-interaction into compelling applications.

1TouchIt - the WP7 application compliments the HVP browser application

Project Description
The SLHVP is an extensible hyperVideo platform to orchestrate media, data, user-experiences, and social-interaction into compelling applications.

1TouchIt - the WP7 application compliments the HVP browser application
